components.html:
Types of security incident include:

- loss of personal information
- unauthorised access to documents
- items left unsecured, like a key cabinet
- suspicious people, vehicles or packages

## Report a security incident by email

To report a security incident, you need to [complete this form](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1W96cpkomUjSQH5qca-SGsUcvqpMfJa85/view?usp=sharing) and email it to [security@justice.gov.uk](#)

## Report a security incident anonymously

You can also [report a security incident anonymously](/). 

Read about our [security policy](#).
To report an IT incident, for example a lost or stolen device, or unauthorised access to an IT system, call 0800 917 5148.

heading: Report a security incident
lede: You can report a security incident by email or anonymously.
